name: Pure Harvest Organic Soy Milk
description:
Pureharvest Organic Nature’s Soy Milk is made with whole soya beans and not protein isolates. As an isolate is not a whole food and Pureharvest refuses to use it. Instead, they derive the goodness which goes into their soy milk from the whole bean. Organic Nature’s Soy Milk is ideal for people with gluten or dairy intolerances – use it in breakfast cereal, cooking and as an alternative to dairy milk.
No Cane Sugar- Gluten-Free- Cholesterol-Free- Lactose-Free- Non-Dairy Product. Suitable For Vegetarians-No Preservatives-No Pesticides-No Herbicides *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
